title: Machine Bicep Preacher / Concentration Curls
description: Standing Water Bottle Bicep Curls Dumbbell Biceps Curl to Shoulder Press Seated Dumbbell Concentration Curls Browse all exercises Machine bicep preacher / concentration curls is a gym work out exercise that targets biceps and also involves forearms. Refer to the illustration diagram and instructions above for how to perform this exercise correctly. Standing water bottle bicep curls, dumbbell biceps curl to shoulder press and seated dumbbell concentration curls are related exercise that target the same muscle groups as machine bicep preacher / concentration curls.
